00086 template <typename Pid_T> class ProcessInterface : public sys::Runnable
00087 {
00088 public:
00089     enum { THE_CHILD = 0 };
00090     enum { PROCESS_CREATE_FAILED = -1 };
00091     ProcessInterface()
00092     {
00093         mTarget = this;
00094     }
00095     ProcessInterface(sys::Runnable* target) : mTarget(target)
00096     {}
00097 
00098     virtual ~ProcessInterface()
00099     {}
00100 
00101     virtual void start() = 0;
00102     virtual void waitFor() = 0;
00103     virtual void run() = 0;
00104 
00105 protected:
00106     Pid_T mChildProcessID;
00107     sys::Runnable* mTarget;
00108 };
